subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: In two years as an assistant under Calhoun, Kevin Ollie established a rapport with players and earned a reputation as a savvy recruiter, after his 13-year N.B.A. playing career ended.
snippet: In two years as an assistant under Calhoun, Kevin Ollie established a rapport with players and earned a reputation as a savvy recruiter, after his 13-year N.B.A. playing career ended.
